description:
With the information obtained from Tetsujin Town, Bisco and Milo continue to head north. As they make their way through Shimobuki Prefecture, the land encased in snow, they encounter Tirol, nearly frozen to death.
With Tirol`s aid, the two continue their journey toward their final destination - Konakidani, the land said to contain the Rust Eater.
Source: crunchyroll
